question: Apa arti dari andina and andani are very diligent and hardwieking. they get up early in the morning. they always tidy up their bedroms then. they help their parents do the hausework. andina prepares the break fast, and andani sweps the floor and does the laundry, after school, they have extracuticutar aktivitas, andani joins the school choir white andani have same diferent chracters too andina is talkative and outpoken white andani is claim andina talkshow a lot white andani is very queit

Jawaban:

andina dan andani sangat rajin dan pekerja keras,mereka selalu bangun pagi ,dan mereka merapikan kamar tidur mereka saat itu.mereka [ juga ] membantu orang tua melakukan pekerjaan rumah,andina bersiap sarapan,dan andani menyapu lantai  dan mencuci pakaian.setelah sekolah,mereka memiliki aktivitas ekstrakuler,andani bergabung dengan paduan suara sekolah [ seterus nya saya tidak tahu :v maaf2 ]

related_questions.question:

2 What is "Narative Text"

4. Name 2 examples of "Quantifiers"

​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. a. Would you like some help?

b. May i offer you some help?

2. A narrative text is a piece of text which tells a story which entertains the reader or listener.

3. a. Adam, I'm afraid that you should definitely see a dentist.

b. Robin, I think you should study more.

4. a. I saw few people in the program.

b. Liam has many friends here.

related_questions.question:
Read the following text to answer questions number 15 to 17. Last month, I sent to Surabaya with my friends for vacation. We went there on a night bus. When we arrived in Lamongan, the bus stopped at a small restaurant for a rest. I got off the bus to get a cup of ginger tea, and my friend drank some cold lemonade. Then I went to the toilet. It tool only a few minutes. When I came out again, the bus was not there, it had gone! My friends were not there too. Feeling shocked and confused. I asked a waiter About the bus. She said the bus departed about five minutes ago. I tried to call my friend on my phone, but the battery as running low. I could not do anything but hope and pray. After several minutes, my wish came true. The bus came back! I got on the bus and walked to my seat. I was so ashamed when everybody on the bus looked at me. I could feel my face turn red. 15. What is the best title of the text above? *     A. My vacation.
B. Vacation with my family.
C. Vacation to Surabaya.
D. Vacation to foreign Country.
Last month I went to Surabaya with my friends for vacation..." This part belongs to . . . . *
A. Orientation
B. Series of events
C. Reorientation
D. Setting of time and place
The bus was not there it had gone!" The word "it" in the second paragraph refers to . . . *
A. The writer
B. The bus
C. The waiter
The cold lemonade
​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. A. my vacation

2. D. Setting of time and place

3. B. The bus

Penjelasan:

semoga membantu :)
